name: Acute Lower Back Strain
chief_complaint: I can't bend over without sharp pain in my lower back
treatment: gradual return to activity with physical therapy exercises
prognosis: Excellent with proper management; typically resolves within 2-4 weeks
description: A common musculoskeletal injury involving overstretching or tearing of the muscles and ligaments supporting the lumbar spine, often caused by improper lifting or sudden twisting movements
